name: humory
description: Text provenance service for tracking typing activities in external forms and surveys
_vercelBuildCommand: For frontend-user deployment on Vercel, use: npm run build:vercel-frontend-user

scripts.build:all: npm run build:tracker && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:vercel-frontend-user: npm run clean:ts-artifacts && npm run build --workspace=@humory/shared && npm run build --workspace=@humory/editor && npm run build --workspace=@humory/frontend-user
scripts.clean:ts-artifacts: rm -rf packages/shared/dist packages/editor/dist packages/shared/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/editor/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/frontend-user/.next
